data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ta9W0jkmAZMQ7kNvgGDcHhC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYChq3uaVXzurI0SEOEu2n5aPAeSHD-kEF6KbiKX6evgvg&oe=669A4E9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I6sW0wb55JkQ7kNvgHZNGil&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYACxZGsjVpWBlc5zWoGwM6pKLMAQcKLgMQRYzs9KRfp5A&oe=669A5824)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=H9VOsaKjOiUQ7kNvgHhdWdX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBEJ1pkbVTu4SBUzdhMUbyZn0P2uBCAEKy9W8-TmEJt_w&oe=669A3F87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yXl7uUZfCesQ7kNvgFj9Amt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCtS6SLcyne4bHgb8rOLm1d9B_C24yBj6uCHRfrQDozNQ&oe=669A3266)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0e6T1mj6eQcQ7kNvgH20svX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBb07A31qbaRn6_aOsnLjCKz2mKOnMgNLcfENcnXFXnkw&oe=669A5ED8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0EYpAwgTdFYQ7kNvgGDuwTU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBI4PfPeOGomv_vQs70u1hnWBiLbHL6cLuvo8eZwMtPhQ&oe=669A5B59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0PjXw6qrWoIQ7kNvgEgRd-m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCma3ezeRbdp18xutx2X1teshJIA83DhZs5xdZFOR0mNg&oe=669A4170)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GK6dzZI8k90Q7kNvgEENxxY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpfZ2-4tmWFjJ0qNQVfunlSwIdb0dg8OQwe4by8PVTfw&oe=669A2BEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uNisn9qVeQoQ7kNvgEY-l-F&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDTAibdSwBbFHLpDc_e2K3X7q4x7N_Leajx9lMgNUVGkQ&oe=669A3F97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pE57CJ1GPygQ7kNvgHsRjcs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBtFmFDzYYSgc_8AABFx0nvHuVrzJ-Z5Y6h49pkL-kB4g&oe=669A5B0C)
